00018 #include <string>
00019 #include <iostream>
00020 
00021 class phrase : public std::string{
00022 public:
00023   phrase() : std::string() {}
00024   phrase(const char* s) : std::string(s) {}
00025   phrase(const std::string& s) : std::string(s) {}
00026   phrase& operator=(const char* s){ std::string::operator=(s); return *this; }
00027   phrase& operator=(const std::string& s)
00028   { std::string::operator=(s); return *this; }
00029 };
00031 inline std::istream& operator>>(std::istream& i, phrase& s){
00032   s.clear();
00033   char next;
00034   int nquotes = 0;
00035   while( (i.get(next) ) && nquotes < 2 ){
00036     if( next == '"') nquotes++;
00037     else if(nquotes) s.append(1,next);
00038   }
00039   return i;
00040 }
00041 
00043 inline std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& o, phrase& s){
00044   return o<<'"'<<(std::string&)(s)<<'"';
00045 }

00048 #endif
